channel.title: Gazelle on Frieserlabs blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gazelle on Frieserlabs blog

item.title: Ignore a folder with Gazelle
item.description: Gazelle is a Bazel build file generator for Bazel projects. Sometimes, we need to ignore some folder where Gazelle look into to generate build files. Add this to your root BUILD.bazel file: # BUILD.bazel # gazelle:exclude folder_path
